message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. $120 is a bit high for me. I'm interested in the product but would be willing to pay $100 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $110.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $110 is still a little too high for me.  How about $105?  I'm hoping we can reach a deal that works for both of us.
I'm glad we're still in negotiations, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product, so I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $108.
